meanings.definition: A person who specializes in photogrammetry, the science of making measurements from photographs.
meanings.sent1: The skilled photogrammetrists analyzed the aerial photographs to measure distances accurately.
meanings.sent2: Photogrammetrists play a crucial role in creating detailed maps for urban planning.
meanings.sent3: The photogrammetrists had a competition to see who could measure the most objects in a photo.
meanings.sent4: She had the precision of a photogrammetrist when it came to estimating the size of the building.
meanings.sent5: The photogrammetrists' ability to extract data from images is truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The photogrammetrists' work involves using aerial photographs to create maps and models.
meanings.sent1: After analyzing the aerial photographs, the photogrammetrists began constructing the 3D model.
meanings.sent2: The team of photogrammetrists collaborated to produce accurate topographic maps.
meanings.sent3: The photogrammetrists joked that they could map the entire world if they had enough photos.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a group of photogrammetrists, piecing together information to form a complete picture.
meanings.sent5: The photogrammetrists' dedication to their craft is evident in the detailed maps they create.
